title: Why doesn't SWAT Braum exist yet, Riot? He would have a RIOT SHIELD!!!
body:
EDIT: Riot Braum, not SWAT Braum. This makes it even better! Riot Braum with a Riot shield!

Topic.
I mean, come on. He'll have a Riot Shield.
Riot Braum will have a Riot Shield.
Again, a RIOT shield.
Why haven't you jumped on this yet?!

replies.body: Because It should be Riot Braum, not SWAT Braum... Graves has actually skin "Riot Graves", not "SWAT Graves". {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

Because Singed already has a skin with that.

And it's called Riot Singed.
But Singed doesn't use it. Braum uses his shield badassfully, Singed just...carries it.
does the flip mean nothing.

Well...I guess the flip means something. I take that back!

But Braum would use it more {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Don't forget he also stabs people with it.
Indeed, no need for two
http://xrs-skin-saling.weebly.com/uploads/2/7/0/3/27032036/s183368271189298832_p1_i2_w1920.jpeg
So does Leona. Why stop there?
My guess is there's already a singed ski with the same concept.

Singed may have a riot shield, he doesn't actually use it.
Braum would use his RIOT Shield for the safety of all the ADCs!
I would only use it for the safety of the poros.

Nah, Riot Braum.

RIOT THE PICTURE EXIST JUST POLISH IT WHY ISN'T THIS A THING!!!!????

I think they need to create a "police pack" that features the Officer Vi skin, Constable Trundle, Swat Braum, Riot Control Graves etc.

I think that would be a really good idea.
no, the riot skins should not come in the pack unless it's the riot pack with all of them.

I dont understand what you mean. My point was to say to create a pack of 5 characters that have a police theme and since Vi and Trundle already have a skin like it then those are the first 2 and all they have to do is add 3 more with Braum being one of them.

I dont see what your problem with that is.

there is already a whole riot theme. to include one without the rest is a disservice.

Ok, then put more in. Im not against it.

Jeez, it was just an idea to create a pack of ALL police related skins where i only mentioned a few.

Im surprised you couldnt understand that.

"My point was to say to create a pack of 5 characters that have a police theme"

that was pretty clear. now I'm not against there being a police pack, I'm against there being a police pack with a riot skin. now if instead of graves there was officer cait or something that would be an interesting idea worthy or praise, but you named specifically one of the riot skins. that's a nono.

my original point dude. i kept saying etc. etc. etc. plus i havent been on the forum in a while so i forgot what i posted anyway.

stop trying to pick everything apart.

My original point was to create a police pack full of all the Law enforcement skins there are.

Read my original comment next time before you speak.

i see you are thoroughly in a corner, and like the gentleman i am, I will let you leave. but understand this, the riot skins do NOT belong in a generic police pack, due to not being generic police skins. they are the RIOT skins. you know, like the company name. that is why they need to be kept in a similar place.

anyway, now that this is done with, I will take my leave. do not respond to this again, it is not worth anymore time from either of us.

Considering you couldn't even understand (and still don't understand) what the point of my original post is I think it would be wise for you to leave this argument.

All those skins are a POLICE THEME. The matter of them being Riot skins is completely irrelevant and yet you are making a big issue out of literally nothing.

Good bye.

Braum in law enforcement?

Well, he DOES have a mustache...
